EventHubName.Title: Azure Event Hub
EventHubName.Description: The name of the event hub to recieve the messages from the data generator.

EventHubConnectionString.Title: Event Hub Connection String
EventHubConnectionString.Description: The connection string to the service bus containing the event hub.

SampleDataFilePath.Title: User provided sample csv data file.
SampleDataFilePath.Description: Data generator will consume the sample data file provided by user.

StorageAccountConnectionString.Title: Azure Storage Connection String
StorageAccountConnectionString.Description: The connection string to an Azure Storage service

SqlServerName.Title: Azure SQL Server
SqlServerName.Description: The name of an Azure SQL server

SqlDatabaseName.Title: Azure SQL Database
SqlDatabaseName.Description: The name of the SQL Database

SqlTableName.Title: Azure SQL Database Table
SqlTableName.Description: The name of the SQL Database Table

User.Title: Azure SQL User
User.Description: The SQL user name that will have access

Credential.Title: Azure SQL User Password
Credential.Description: The SQL user password that will have access
